meanings.definition: A projecting beam or timber used in supporting a building.
meanings.sent1: The antas in the old house were strong and held up the roof.
meanings.sent2: The construction worker placed the antas carefully to ensure the stability of the structure.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat climbed the antas and pretended to be a king surveying his kingdom.
meanings.sent4: The antas of the building stood tall like guardians protecting the inhabitants within.
meanings.sent5: The antas creaked under the weight of the heavy snow, but they did not falter.

meanings.definition: A decorative architectural element resembling a half-column.
meanings.sent1: The elegant antas added a touch of sophistication to the entrance of the building.
meanings.sent2: The antas were intricately carved with floral patterns, enhancing the beauty of the structure.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child tried to hide behind the antas, thinking they could shield him from view.
meanings.sent4: The antas stood proudly like soldiers at attention, welcoming visitors with grace.
meanings.sent5: The golden antas gleamed in the sunlight, casting a warm glow on the facade of the building.

meanings.definition: A type of antelope found in Africa.
meanings.sent1: The graceful antas roamed the savannah in search of fresh grass.
meanings.sent2: The antas moved swiftly across the plains, their horns glistening in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkey tried to imitate the antas' graceful movements but ended up tripping over its own feet.
meanings.sent4: The antas' swift agility in evading predators was a sight to behold in the vast African landscape.
meanings.sent5: The herd of antas moved as one, a beautiful dance of nature in the wild.
